Extracted Variables:
- x: number of large art pieces to be made
- y: number of small art pieces to be made

Definitions:
- x: number of large art pieces to be made
- y: number of small art pieces to be made

Extracted Constraints:
- 4x + 2y \leq 100 (paint constraint)
- 3x + y \leq 50 (glitter constraint)
- 5x + 2y \leq 70 (glue constraint)
- x \geq 5 (minimum 5 large art pieces)
- y \geq 5 (minimum 5 small art pieces)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 30x + 15y (profit)
